website_summaries.verdict: A great medium coverage foundation that helps improve skin as well.
pros: Medium coverage foundation with a satin finish that is available in many shades
Contains vitamin C and turmeric to brighten skin
cons: Doesn't come with a pump, but one can be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: !!NOT NARS!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT NARS THIS IS NOT NARS THIS IS NOT NARS! I purchased this product and received a nars box and nars bottle but the foundation inside was not nars foundation in fact I wouldn't even call it foundation I don't know what the brown greasy odd smells liquid was but I know what it wasn't (Nars) the poorest foundation you could find would be 100x better than this mess i well be asking for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong product and it was open and used.
customer_reviews.text: I not only received the wrong product but it was open and half of it was used. You could see where someone’s finger had been dipping into it, using it for quite some time. Definitely makes me question if it’s even a Nars product at all. The correct item was sent but I’m feeling wary about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is not the same product that I purchase through Sephora something is differnt about it diluted maybe...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it is not the same product that I purchase through Sephora, something is differnt about it. diluted maybe. not happy with purchase, i don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I saw a tutorial on YouTube and decided to try this foundation. I rarely wear makeup because It always feels heavy to me and goes into any creases. This makeup blended perfectly with my skin tone, felt light, crease-free and glowing. I love it! Will definitely keep this on deck for a special occassion where I wanna doll up.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nella

customer_reviews.title: Mac NC30 matches Stromboli
customer_reviews.text: I love this a little goes a long way! this feels so light weight i wear NC30 pro long wear and Stromboli was a perfect match i have oily skin and this foundation looks amazing i'm wearing this with my NARS under eye concealer in Custard and my skin looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: LoveShopping123

customer_reviews.title: The perfect foundation!
customer_reviews.text: The only foundation I will use! Perfect amount of coverage without looking or feeling heavy. My skin glows and it does not break my skin out! Arrived quickly and carefully packaged
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann

customer_reviews.title: The coverage is nice but not overly heavy and it does not make ...
customer_reviews.text: I have acne prone skin and so far it has not caused any significant breakouts. The coverage is nice but not overly heavy and it does not make my face shiny. I am pretty bare bones with makeup but I like a nice foundation to cover my acne marks and this does a nice job of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alpaca

customer_reviews.title: Great item!  Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Nars product for a year now and I love it! The seller I purchase this from also put a perfume sample in my Nars package (Derek Lam) and I LOVE it! It is my new favorite perfume and I have already ordered some. Thanks so much! Very happy shopper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good stuff. Not greasy, not cakey. It's pretty light coverage so if you're looking to turn your face into a plastic shield, I wouldn't buy this. But for us who only want to smooth/even out our skin tones, this stuff does a pretty good job.
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It gives complete coverage without any oily feeling
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: NARS Sheer Glow Foundation, Tahoe ..
customer_reviews.text: NARS Sheer Glow Foundation, Tahoe ... NARS - Is a wonderful foundation i just think i need a shade lighter to match my skin tone
customer_reviews.author: JL2000

customer_reviews.title: I like this foundation a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this foundation a lot. It's light weight and doesn't look like I'm wearing heavy makeup, it just evens out my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: NLev

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: It was thin and nothing like the NARS foundation I’ve bought previously at Ulta. Definitely did not seem like the same product. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nintendoll

customer_reviews.title: Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back. It was too watery and runny. Not like the original at all. They discontinued this color and I will have to find another color that works.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about how the color would turn out on my tan skin but I love it!!! I ordered Santa Fe and although it is a little light, I love it because it blends in easily and doesn't make me look too tan, I love this foundation. I use my Belle Pierre then this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Book Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color - Won't Let Me Return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Santa Fe color of this product, but received the "Punjab" color with a "Santa Fe" sticker on it. When I tried to return it on Amazon, I got an obscure "out of stock" message and was sent back to the main orders screen. Very disappointed, as this color does not work for my skin and I wasted nearly $50.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Willbrand

customer_reviews.title: Soso
customer_reviews.text: I like this foundation, but it doesn't stay on all day!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dewy
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the only foundation that is yellow enough for my NC35 skin. When applied, you can still see my freckles but then I again can't find a foundation that covers them anyways. It's a dewy finish which I kind of dont like on a summer day time cause I look oily, just powder it up! none the less it feels nice, applies great, perfect shade.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great long lasting just wish it came with a pump
customer_reviews.author: alysha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Will never go back to my old fondation. Where has this been my whole life?!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse S

customer_reviews.title: The coverage is really good and feels light on your face
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is really good and feels light on your face! I like that it is oil-free and Non-comegenic!
customer_reviews.author: Ksuliman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foundation
customer_reviews.text: The perfect foundation and I have tried many. Color and coverage are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Happily Retired

customer_reviews.title: perfect match.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it's the same formula you'd find at sephora just less expensive and I will definitely be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent foundation
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated buying this foundation because it is not cheap. But you get what you pay for! This foundation is wonderful. Never looks cakey, streaky or orange. You don't need much on your face for a perfect glow that lasts all day. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: laurel

customer_reviews.title: wow its really amazing
customer_reviews.text: u cant even feel u have foundation n its cover u fully i spend lots of money on many branded foundation but this is best i go for this ceylan colour coz its perfect for my yellowish white skin tone ...i love it ....
customer_reviews.author: tipsy

customer_reviews.title: This foundation was worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I kind of came upon it by accident I always hated foundations but my skin is uneven now and I find .this really looks polished. It is neither sheer nor glow on me it is a little matte with good coverage but reasonably natural looking
customer_reviews.author: Mermaidshopper

customer_reviews.title: A NARS sales representative did a color match and recommended a NARS foundation which I wore for months
customer_reviews.text: A NARS sales representative did a color match and recommended a NARS foundation which I wore for months. During that time my friends told me my foundation was too yellow for my skin. I ordered this product thinking it would be more acceptable and it was far too dark. I no longer use NARS foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Bo

customer_reviews.title: ... product for a few years now and it's the best foundation I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a few years now and it's the best foundation I've ever used. When you first rub it in, it shows a little, but give it a chance.... within minutes it blends perfectly into your skin and stays that way the entire day! I get comments all the time on how "flawless" my skin is, but my secret is not Nature, it's NARS :) Customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: FrostaCat

customer_reviews.title: The best foundation ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying different foundations for a long time, but this one is the best one I've tried. my face looks beautiful all day long! good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Kariny Ataide

customer_reviews.title: Not great for flash photography
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is or gorgeous on the skin- I think my shade is just too light for my complexion . Also it has major flash back at night with flash photography.
customer_reviews.author: Janner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love the sheer coverage and natural look of this foundation. It covers up freckles and sun spots but doesn't look caked on at all. Not too heavy, blends easily, stays all day. I have auburn hair and brown eyes, with freckles and medium-light skin. This is a great color for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P. Conant

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a department store the first time. Loved it but did not want to drive across town to get it again. Looked on Amazon and there it is. Very pleased with how smooth it makes my skin look and covers my dark age spots well. Have used now for a year and a half and extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Beth m

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: amazing foundation, dosent get cakey and stays on my face all day. The color is perfect and blends amazingly well. I also like that it has skincare in it to actually improve your skin over time! I dont need a concealer when i use this foundation either!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I look great. I will post a pic later
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a four because it seems to have a red undertone, and I really need to have a yellow undertone. I look great. I will post a pic later.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Valcin

customer_reviews.title: Great Foundation!!
customer_reviews.text: I've using this foundation for 2 years and I LOVE it!!! Great coverage, non grease and it gives you a subtle glow. A little pricey, but soo worth it! Shipping was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: basics

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I am used to using powder foundation, but recently saw a girl using this product in a youtube video. It is a little pricey, but after using it, it is very worth the price!!!! It goes on so smoothly, and you do not need a whole lot. I applied with the foundation brush from SHANY cosmetics (which i highly recommend). Ordering the right color can be hard, especially since you are ordering it online. I ordered Punjab and this color is just perfect. It a medium tint and if you have somewhat of a yellow tint to you, i would recommend this color.
customer_reviews.author: VIRGINIA MATLOCK

customer_reviews.title: Nars - Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a couple of years now, very happy with the way it looks, feels and lasts. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: vry gud
customer_reviews.text: vry fst shipng. very gud product. will recomd the seller to friends and will b bying again soon.thnks s much!! ;;,,* /^&&& ,&78* &&&7& &&&&8 &&&8 &&8** &*8*
customer_reviews.author: leslie mirandilla

customer_reviews.title: Love hate
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I love this foundation, sometimes I hate it. You canNOT have dry skin whatsoever when wearing this or it will cling to every little flake. When my skin is really soft and moisturized it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this foundation after reading an article about "non-makeup " makeup. It was one of the best with "full coverage ". So knowing NARS is. Reputable company I paid the money and ordered. Good side: Great Coverage. Down Side: you have got to know your color or it's a waste. So, olive the foundation. But I will never buy again until I've been to a store and tested them all!!
customer_reviews.author: P. James

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware. Not Nars.
customer_reviews.text: I love Nars and trust this product, however, I could tell that this was not the actual Nars foundation. The lid would not even screw on properly. After reading other reviews, I am scared to use on my sensitive skin. It really sucks because the color matched my skin perfectly, but I only tested it on the top of my hand. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dixon

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Always been picky about my foundation, and this passed all the tests! It’s last all day, makes my skin look like a porcelain doll, evens out blemishes, doesn’t look or feel heavy, very lightweight! Bought new, arrived described, fast shipping and packaged well, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CarrieAnn

customer_reviews.title: Subtle & Smooth Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I switched to NARS after my former brand of foundation became so pricey. I’ll never go back. This foundation looks like I just have a smooth and natural look (for an over-75 woman!), not pasty or orange!
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: Light and Cakey
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and light for fair skinned people like me, but it cakes really easily. If my skin isn't flawless, it tends to exaggerate any blemishes or flakiness.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foundation at wrong price
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! Nars comes through again! Sheer Glow is more hydrating than their tinted moisturizer for me. You loose stars on the price...Vendor price higher than mfg suggested retail price at local stores...when I need refill, I will buy locally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon? Maybe...

customer_reviews.title: Improves my complexion
customer_reviews.text: This foundation while light weight has excellent coverage. It gives my complexion a flawless look. The color is perfect for my light olive skin. GreT for mature skin. Good value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Ricaud

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth
customer_reviews.text: Quite surprised the foundation had a very dry, finish. Definitely needed to apply a heavy moisturizer beforehand. Product was quite expensive and was expecting a smooth application and effect. Won't purchase or recommend. Perhaps when purchased online the vendor had expired products. Should have sampled in a reputable dept. store. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Just Tried It!
customer_reviews.text: Just started trying NARS products, like 'em. Color was true, and easy to apply. I add a little extra oil to my hands when applying, as my skin tends to be on the dry side. This blends nicely into the skin. A bit pricey, but from all I read - worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Prosperity

customer_reviews.title: its great with awesome coverage even though some days it tended ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a pump, turns out I had to buy that separately. its great with awesome coverage even though some days it tended to run
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation, great shade.
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice foundation. And this shade is finally pale enough for me! I am really pale, and can hardly ever find shades that are in fact light enough for me, in any line. So I'm thrilled with this. The consistency is nice, and it blends well. A real find.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described. Coverage is not great if you have large imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but it is too dark. This is the only draw-back when ordering via on-line.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my all time favorite foundation. It makes your skin glow and covers ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my all time favorite foundation. It makes your skin glow and covers any imperfections superbly! I even conceal with this foundation, I have tried several high end and drugstore foundations and this one trumps them all!
customer_reviews.author: ERIN MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup. I will definitely order again. I ordered Punjab which matches my olive, European skin tone perfectly. It's also quite thick and easy to apply with a wet beauty blender. No aroma really.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: GREAT foundation. Great color choices
customer_reviews.text: GREAT foundation. Great color choices. One of my favorites for sure. I have red undertones and this color works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love every NARS product. This foundation looks so natural yet provides enough coverage. Tried another foundation about 2 years ago and immediately went back to NARS.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great foundation
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase - and note that using primer really makes the difference in both balancing color and its staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi N

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Best most beautiful foundation ever! It is velvety and soft. My skin looks flawless. I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: MMEConner

customer_reviews.title: Love NARS. Even with oily skin it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Love NARS. Even with oily skin it does not look shiny. STays all day.
customer_reviews.author: Meital Kabeli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I never buy myself fancy make up. But wanted to do something nice for myself! After a lot of research I discovered that this product would be the perfect fit for my needs. Totally worth the price! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Glowy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foundation. I use it on days i don't need too much coverage, but i want my complexion to be evened out and look natural. I'm concerned that it is clogging my pores though, which is odd because the formula isn't too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Busse

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FOUNDATION
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over 3 years now and I love this foundation. Nars is the best makeup line out there because they have such good products. All the foundations/lipglosses/tinted moisturizers that I have bought from them are fabulous. This foundation is super airy and light and gives just the right amount of coverage without feeling heavy. Recommended for someone who is looking for just the right amount of coverage to even out skin tone and to look flawless. This will do the trick. With use, you also see improvement in texture of skintone.
customer_reviews.author: Jbyrne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love NARS foundation. Goes on smooth and looks very natural.
customer_reviews.author: TFox

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great foundation. It match my skin tone very well and i dont need too much of it to cover ll my face.
customer_reviews.author: Arto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color match - lasting wear - good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I'm asian -- my daughter is half asian and half white but she tans to about my coloring in the summer. We both wear this color and it matches us both well. I don't normally wear foundation in the summer because I get darker and my skin is too oily for foundation in the summer...so this matches me in winter and spring. My kid wears it all year and so far so good. It covers blemishes well...and has a perfect hint of gold to get in with Asian coloring. Not heavy and lasts all day. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: BELLZ

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am curious to now how the Sheer matte one looks because this one has a matte finish. But it is more of a satin sueade finish if that makes sense. But either way, this looks gorgeous. I like to apply it with a buffing brushing or a flat top brush.
customer_reviews.author: Charita Scott

customer_reviews.title: NARS fan!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my skin looking flawless and smooth, like I've just been airbrushed! I give the actual foundation 5 stars, but I rated it 4 because you have to purchase the pump separate (and it's not cheap!).
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!!!!!!!!!!Stay away if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: BE WARE! How i wished there was a minus star to totally express my disgust of this product. I brought it for a friend in Trinidad who after buying and clearing etc paid close to $600 ttd. She has equisite skin...or should i say HAD. Please beware seriously! After 2 uses.....has broken out with cystic acne....and she has a milk white skin tone...so now she had reddish pinkish patches about her face....very depressing for a girl who had flawless skin and never suffered with acne. WE BOTH TRUSTED THE MANY POSITIVE REVIEWS ON THIS PRODUCT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN.....BUT NEVER AGAIN.. I THOUGH PRICE WAS AN INDICATION OF GREAT QUALITY......BUT CLEARLY HERE IT IS NOT THE CASE.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Looked like the perfect shade for me
customer_reviews.text: Looked like the perfect shade for me, but this foundation had a yellow tint. Ending up throwing away. Also didn't think it covered very well.?
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a faithful user of MAC Studio Fix Fluid, but I kept hearing all of the hype about Nars Sheer Glow. It is amazing and I am loving it more than my MAC. The coverage is great. I find it gives similar coverage to the Studio Fix Fluid, but it is a lot more lightweight. I am an NC15 and bought the color Gobi. It is a perfect match and I couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: J. Heflin

customer_reviews.title: Sheer glow
customer_reviews.text: Loved it makes skin glow matched my nc 20 skin perfectly perfect for dry skin gives it a glow ..fast delivery thank u!
customer_reviews.author: hind

customer_reviews.title: Did not have all of the information.
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten into my girly mood and really wanted a good foundation for this summer. I have heard so many wonderful things about NARS in general and especially about the sheer glow foundation. I later heard that it is not great for people with dry skin. I have combination. I expected it to have a natural(ish) look. It does look great for about 10 mintues on me, then I get the cakey uneven look. I have tried to apply it different ways(hands, sponge, brush, with and without powder) and it just does not look good. I still heard on some skin types it looks amazing, but it is just not worth the money for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Hate it!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is sooooo YELLOW which may be good if you have more of a yellow skin-tone. The color selection is terrible but the formula is nice. I'd rather go with Makeup Forever Matte Velvet + or HD foundation. Makeup Forever has a much more natural color selection and it's not hard to find your color match.
customer_reviews.author: A. Read

product_meta.title: NARS Sheer Glow Foundation, Stromboli
feature_bullets: Improves skin brightness & texture with daily use
